title: No, That’s Not the Croatian Football Team Praying During World Cup
subtitle: A video showing a team of footballers huddled in a hotel room singing and praying has gone viral on WhatsApp and Facebook with a false message that it depicts the Croatian team during the ongoing World Cup in Russia.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video showing a team of footballers huddled in a hotel room singing and praying has gone viral on WhatsApp and Facebook, with a false message that it depicts the Croatian team during the ongoing World Cup in Russia.

The clips shows a bunch of footballers in a hotel room singing and praying with what appears to be an open bible placed on the hotel bed.

The video is being shared on social media with text that reads as, “This is Croatia Foot Ball Team. They play together, but pray and praise together too. This is the secret why they had won in 2 matches so far. God bless them… (sic)”
